it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.client

Class CommandHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.dinapolidinardo.client.CommandHandler

  • public class CommandHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that receives a map of commands from the socket interface and communicate with the view asking the needed inputs for every request

    • Method Detail

      • handleCommand

        public void handleCommand(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> param)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        handle the request from the socket interface addressing it to the correct view method
        Parameters:
        param - the map composed of two fields where the two "keys" are "object" and "action". Depending on the values of these two entries calls different view methods
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on streams errors
